attributes.additional_details: Our school has been increasing the cost of the food without students even knowing. This is unfair because some parents are becoming worried that their child is hungry in school because of the small portion sizes. We as a community can stop this and make the costs better for all of us. Thank you.      Tom
attributes.background: Thank you for taking time to read my petition. I am a current student of a school which have been increasing the cost of food without the students knowing.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. This is the responsibility of your school. You could raise this issue with your school's governing body.
